summary:
I am an experienced recruiter, passionate about recruiting professionals that not only fits the job roles and job description of organizations but also the company's culture and values.

Whatever your company size, industry or recruitment needs, we adopt a tailor-made approach for every organization that we work with so you can be assured of quality service and excellent delivery.

We have a team of recruitment professionals who specialize in a wide array of industries, many of who came from the industries in which they now recruit. Our recruiters combine their in depth understanding of their industries with their vast network of industry experts to get quality talent for organizations.

Region Targeted: Europe & US

Looking for a consultancy to handle your recruitment? We have a data pool of candidates across various industries, experience level and job roles. Contact us to discuss your company requirements and get a quote.

Here is a list of industry sectors that we recruit for: Government, Telecommunication, Legal services, Construction, Food processing, Consulting, Gambling, Retail sales, Franchising, Real estate, Education
Pharmaceuticals, Hospitality/Tourism, Mass media, Healthcare/hospitals, Public health, Information Technology, Waste disposal, Banking, Insurance, Financial services and FMCG

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

profile_positions.description:
As a global provider of IT staffing services and the second largest in Europe, Seek connects the very best IT professionals to great opportunities at leading companies. And we do it every single day – for both temporary and permanent assignments and across virtually all industries. We use our insight, flexibility and expanded resources to anticipate the needs of leading tech companies and help them make exceptional connections with top tech talent.

Our Services Include:
- Staff Augmentation
- Direct Placement
- Management Consulting Solutions

Our Competitive Advantage:
- Dedicated, experienced leadership
- Proven and flexible delivery methodologies
- Quality processes
- Corporate values and ethics policy
- Internal project management office and guidelines
- Project success rate in the high 90th percentile (an exceptional rating within the industry)

Success is about making the right connections between people, solutions and objectives. With Seek, you can take a strategic approach to boosting performance through an optimal mix of internal staff, outside consulting resources and project outsourcing. And because we take the time to properly understand the needs of our clients and candidates, we can help them make exceptional connections and achieve greater levels of success.
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Provision of recruitment services for companies in a wide array of industries. Responsible for providing an entire team or required number of staff for organizations.

I head the recruitment team at NokiaTalent Solutions where we provide recruitment services for all sectors.

Whether it's permanent and temporary staffing, contract staffing, outsourcing, and pre-employment check services, we help you find your desired candidate or team for your project.

Region: Africa

Key Responsibilities

- Oversee the recruiting functions of Nokia International Talent Solutions.

- Meet new clients and discuss new vacancies, current or future projects.

- Providing leadership in the delivery of all recruitment activities, ensuring world class experience for applicants and service to Hiring Managers.

- Monitoring and analyzing Applicant Tracking System data.

- Attend meetings, conferences and other appointments.

- Ensuring development of job aides and process flows for all recruitment activities.
profile_positions.title: Talent Specialist
